column4: i wanted to install multimeida codecs, but can't find "Multimedia (multiverse) > gstreamer0.8-lame" in Synaptic. i see the "Multimedia (multiverse)" category but not this package in it... Can anyone help me?
check your repositories against a standard list...looks like you are missing something
no
disable those in your sources.list
its definitely there
your not finding it..which must mean a different problem...because it does exist
cant you take a look at my sources.list file please? is it ok? http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3875
roger
I pasted my sources.list in there too, can you compare them plz? http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3877
you could always use that link at the top of my source list to make another source list for yourself ;)
yes, as ubotu told me
well i will just try to take your .list. do you think its ok?..
yeah you could do that...just remove all the '.au' parts
or use http://ubuntulinux.nl/source-o-matic
using sourc-o-matic will allow you to have a localised sources.list
i see
but you have also added this "deb cdrom:.." package, right?..
you can add your CD via synaptic.....
go to synaptic and look in the menus for 'Add CD'
that will work too :)
omg, i did everything but it still is not there!..  this is my new .list file partly generated by source-o-matic http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3878
something else is wrong
seems to be..
